title: Art and life in Italy
brief_description: Italy: the countryside, architecture and sculpture. Rome: the Colosseum, Pantheon, and St Peter’s Cathedral, church interiors, mosaics; a Giotto fresco. Florence: Cathedral dome and bronze doors, Medici palaces, Raphael’s painting. Botticelli’s “Adoration of the Magi”: Della Robbia’s “Singing Angels” and Michelangelo’s “Figure of Moses”. Venice : the churches. No other credits available.
